titleStmt.title: The true character of a rigid Presbyter with a narrative of the dangerous designes of the English and Scotish covenanters as they have tended to the ruine of our Church and Kingdom : also the articles of their dogmatic faith and the inconsistency thereof with monarchy : to which is added a short history of the English rebellion / compiled in verse by Marchamont Nedham; and formerly extant in his Mercurius pragmaticus.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of J. Calvin and are to be sold by Z. Crofton ...,

notesStmt.note: "A short history" (p.45-93) has special t.p.; in verse.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
